job_tasks.phrase: Defining the ML/AI architecture for Booking around the aforementioned domains
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the architectural design of ML/AI systems, which is a core software engineering task related to building and integrating these systems into the broader Booking platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Defining the strategic technical direction over 1-3 years
job_tasks.justification: This involves long-term technical planning and strategy, a key aspect of software engineering leadership and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with our sister ML-Ops department, to build the right architecture and capabilities for the business
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working with an ML-Ops department to build architecture and capabilities, aligning with the operational and deployment aspects of ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Providing feedback to people managers and teams around incoming requests and prioritization
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and aligning technical efforts with business priorities, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Generating and preserving stakeholder alignment across multiple areas of business towards the strategy defined in (1).
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to align technical strategy with business stakeholders, a key aspect of business understanding and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying new areas of investment, evaluating their feasibility, and getting stakeholder buy-in
job_tasks.justification: This involves strategic business analysis, feasibility assessment, and stakeholder management, all falling under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Educating stakeholders around the ML engineering aspect of our products
job_tasks.justification: This task requires translating technical concepts for a business audience, demonstrating business understanding and communication skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentoring and coaching Managers and Individual Contributors in everything related to ML Engineering
job_tasks.justification: While mentoring is a soft skill, the context of mentoring on ML Engineering implies guiding technical strategy and best practices, linking to business understanding and technical leadership.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, understand and share takeaways to build a strong knowledge-base of the system
job_tasks.justification: This involves analyzing systems and data to build knowledge, which is a form of data engineering and analysis, contributing to the understanding of the system's data aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with Machine Learning and Personalisation Paradigms
job_tasks.justification: Understanding ML paradigms is foundational to developing and integrating ML into software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Strong technical understanding and systems thinking;
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental software engineering skill, crucial for designing and integrating complex systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience working with data engineering and Big Data in general
job_tasks.justification: Directly relates to the tasks of managing and processing large datasets, a key part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with data analysis and generating data insights
job_tasks.justification: This involves analyzing data to derive insights, which is a core data engineering and analysis task.

job_tasks.phrase: Customer focused and obsessed with solving user problems;
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on understanding user needs and business problems, aligning with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Agile development methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Agile methodologies are standard practices in software development for managing projects and delivering software.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with making data-driven decisions;
job_tasks.justification: This relates to using data to inform strategic and business decisions.

job_tasks.phrase: Very strong communication and stakeholder leadership skills
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions communication and leadership skills, which are key for stakeholder management and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: ability to lead priorities in time critical situations.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights leadership and communication in critical situations, falling under communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: driving some of this brand-new innovation.
job_tasks.justification: This implies leading the development and implementation of new features, a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: own the technical strategy, long term technical vision, and success definition for our platforms and capabilities in Generative AI, Search Ranking and Recommendations, Promotion Optimization and Content Intelligence (Natural Language Processing & Computer Vision)
job_tasks.justification: This describes owning the technical strategy and vision for platforms, which is a high-level software engineering responsibility, encompassing integration and development of various AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: report directly to the Director of ML/AI in the organization, and work with the most senior leadership of the department.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a senior role within the technical organization, responsible for technical strategy and direction.

job_tasks.phrase: 8+ years hands-on ML engineering development experience;
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to hands-on development experience in ML engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: 5+ years of ML engineering experience on high traffic systems;
job_tasks.justification: Experience with high-traffic systems is a core software engineering concern related to scalability and performance.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience as a technical lead in an organization
job_tasks.justification: Technical leadership is a key aspect of senior software engineering roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with distributed systems, such as Hadoop
job_tasks.justification: Experience with distributed systems is a fundamental software engineering skill.

job_tasks.phrase: Hands on experience of developing in and contributing to open source data technologies is an advantage
job_tasks.justification: This refers to development and contribution to data technologies, a software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Strong strategic problem solver with the ability to zoom in as well as see a 10,000 ft view.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a critical thinking and problem-solving skill essential for software engineering leadership and architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: capabilities in Generative AI, Search Ranking and Recommendations, Promotion Optimization and Content Intelligence (Natural Language Processing & Computer Vision)
job_tasks.justification: While this lists domains, the role of defining architecture and strategy for these implies involvement in the development or oversight of the models themselves, fitting into model development.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes owning the technical strategy and vision for platforms including Generative AI, alongside other ML domains like Search Ranking and Recommendations. It requires significant hands-on ML engineering experience, technical leadership, and the ability to define architecture and long-term direction. While it mentions Generative AI, it also covers traditional ML areas and a strong software engineering foundation (architecture, distributed systems, cloud). The role is balanced between defining strategy for AI capabilities (B) and ensuring their integration and scalability within the broader platform (A), with a clear focus on GenAI as a key area. The emphasis on owning strategy and vision for GenAI capabilities, coupled with the need for strong ML engineering and software architecture, points to a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very detailed, clearly outlining responsibilities, required qualifications, and the strategic importance of ML/AI, including Generative AI. The distinction between core ML and GenAI is implicitly handled by the breadth of domains mentioned, with GenAI being a significant component. The role's senior nature and focus on strategy and architecture make the classification straightforward.
